data.name: Stryff the Owlion
data.item_description: Nothing moves more quietly, nothing strikes harder, than this feathered prowler of the Nightsilver Woods!
data.5: Nothing moves more quietly, nothing strikes harder, than this feathered prowler of the Nightsilver Woods!

data.name: Rampant the Scaled Hunter
data.item_description: Astride the last of the legendary archtyrex, a skilled stormcrafter channels the fury of the storm itself.
data.5: Astride the last of the legendary archtyrex, a skilled stormcrafter channels the fury of the storm itself.

data.name: Feral the Werebat
data.item_description: Werebat? There bat!
data.5: Werebat? There bat!

data.name: Bessy the Batmeleon
data.item_description: The Rider found this exotic creature trying to blend in with a colony of morde-bats before he tamed it for his own.
data.5: The Rider found this exotic creature trying to blend in with a colony of morde-bats before he tamed it for his own.

data.name: Hellstrider
data.item_description: Where rides the knight, only chaos remains.
data.5: Where rides the knight, only chaos remains.

data.name: Grull the Grim Walker
data.item_description: Disruptor had his eye on Grull from the moment he spotted the beast standing in the corner of the breeder's yard. "Who's that one then?" "Grull. None can ride her. She's too disruptive." "Perfect! I'll ride her home!"
data.5: Disruptor had his eye on Grull from the moment he spotted the beast standing in the corner of the breeder's yard. "Who's that one then?" "Grull. None can ride her. She's too disruptive." "Perfect! I'll ride her home!"

data.name: Bertha the Morde-bat
data.item_description: A little sweeter to some, a little meaner to the rest, you'd best be on this beauty's good side if you aim to keep your head.
data.5: A little sweeter to some, a little meaner to the rest, you'd best be on this beauty's good side if you aim to keep your head.

data.name: Roehrin the Pale Stallion
data.item_description: On a pale horse he rides, this spark of endless suns, this Keeper of the Light.
data.5: On a pale horse he rides, this spark of endless suns, this Keeper of the Light.

data.name: Ormr the Lunar Dragon
data.item_description: From a race of dragons that normally patrols the dark side of the moon, Ormr wanted to see the world.
data.5: From a race of dragons that normally patrols the dark side of the moon, Ormr wanted to see the world.

data.name: Andalmere the Litigon
data.item_description: Blessed by Selemene, honored among the denizens of the Nightsilver Woods, the sacred litigon Andalmere now rides to war.
data.5: Blessed by Selemene, honored among the denizens of the Nightsilver Woods, the sacred litigon Andalmere now rides to war.

data.name: Tinek the Unmastered
data.item_description: Never bowed, never broken, Tinek will find the path to victory.
data.5: Never bowed, never broken, Tinek will find the path to victory.

data.name: Rachel the Morde-bat
data.item_description: Rachel ain't one for taking things easy.
data.5: Rachel ain't one for taking things easy.

data.name: Dreaded Forgewing
data.item_description: They say fear lives in the skies, and soars above trailing flames in its wake.  They say an armor-clad terror drifts on the wind, snatching up the unsuspecting with a blazing lasso.  They say it's simple: if you see it, run.  And if it catches you, pray.
data.5: They say fear lives in the skies, and soars above trailing flames in its wake.  They say an armor-clad terror drifts on the wind, snatching up the unsuspecting with a blazing lasso.  They say it's simple: if you see it, run.  And if it catches you, pray.

data.name: Ataxia
data.item_description: On burning hooves it strides, a beast ever eager for the fires of chaos.
data.5: On burning hooves it strides, a beast ever eager for the fires of chaos.

data.name: Morcant
data.item_description: This pale creature found its way down the starlight path as if it heard its future mistress calling.
data.5: This pale creature found its way down the starlight path as if it heard its future mistress calling.

data.name: Gladys the Light-Bearing Mule
data.item_description: Ezalor keeps the Light; Gladys keeps Ezalor.
data.5: Ezalor keeps the Light; Gladys keeps Ezalor.

data.name: Enmity
data.item_description: Its strides are hatred, its bray a judgment, its gallop the march of destruction.
data.5: Its strides are hatred, its bray a judgment, its gallop the march of destruction.

data.name: Vingspan
data.item_description: Ever in search of new thrills, the Rider commandeered an unlikely steed in a faraway land, with nothing but grit and persuasive Garlic breath.
data.5: Ever in search of new thrills, the Rider commandeered an unlikely steed in a faraway land, with nothing but grit and persuasive Garlic breath.

data.name: Bramblehorn
data.item_description: She who rides a tiger is afraid to dismount.
data.5: She who rides a tiger is afraid to dismount.

data.name: Netherax, Nightmare of the Mist
data.item_description: When the Font anointed Abaddon with its power, it also conjured up a creature, equally terrifying, for its champion to ride into battle.
data.5: When the Font anointed Abaddon with its power, it also conjured up a creature, equally terrifying, for its champion to ride into battle.

data.name: Wings of Obelis Mount
data.item_description: Persuaded by prayer.
data.5: Persuaded by prayer.

data.name: Stag of the Northlight
data.item_description: The Keeper is said to travel the icy Northern wastes astride a magnificent stag, giving aid to those in greatest need and vanquishing evil and darkness wherever it is found.
data.5: The Keeper is said to travel the icy Northern wastes astride a magnificent stag, giving aid to those in greatest need and vanquishing evil and darkness wherever it is found.

data.name: Anguilla
data.item_description: There are few mounts that handle the electric currents that surround Disruptor as well as Anguilla, the amphibious electric eel.
data.5: There are few mounts that handle the electric currents that surround Disruptor as well as Anguilla, the amphibious electric eel.

data.name: Avon of the Crescent Moon
data.item_description: Spawned from the Lunar Moth, this felmoth named Avon was raised by Nova. Still young and curious Avon is now trained and ready for her first battle.
data.5: Spawned from the Lunar Moth, this felmoth named Avon was raised by Nova. Still young and curious Avon is now trained and ready for her first battle.

data.name: Atramentos the Apocalyptic
data.item_description: The stygian steed, breaker of prophecies, bearer of the blackened mark, and steeled in thrice-cursed barding. This horrible creature is recently escaped from the prison-plane Fellfoul.
data.5: The stygian steed, breaker of prophecies, bearer of the blackened mark, and steeled in thrice-cursed barding. This horrible creature is recently escaped from the prison-plane Fellfoul.

data.name: Starrider of the Crescent Steel Mount

data.item_name: Starrider of the Crescent Steel Mount
data.4: Starrider of the Crescent Steel Mount

data.name: Warhorse of the Demonic Vessel
data.item_description: These items were created in partnership with Alliance, who receives a portion of every purchase.
data.5: These items were created in partnership with Alliance, who receives a portion of every purchase.

data.name: Flame Bat
data.item_description: The Flame Bat's blood is as thick as tar and burns just as hot.The rider taps the creature's blood, harvesting it for his own fiery needs.
data.5: The Flame Bat's blood is as thick as tar and burns just as hot.The rider taps the creature's blood, harvesting it for his own fiery needs.

data.name: Promo Burning Iron
data.item_description: Belching fire and death, he screams across burning skies. Can't stop the rider!
data.5: Belching fire and death, he screams across burning skies. Can't stop the rider!
